item.title: Making A Website With RStudio: The Blogdown Package
item.description: As a consistent R user of about a year now, I mainly started to use it as another tool besides STATA and SAS. I had never really thought of the prospect of using a software I’d be using for data analysis to make a whole website! Although blogdown is quite different from my usual R use, it’s helped me become acquainted with the versatility of an open source language and all the ways that can enhance the regular data stuff.
